attr.title: TowerFall Ascension
attr.desc: TowerFall Ascension redefines archery combat, delivering adrenaline-pumping versus matches for up to 4 players. With its intense battles and easy-to-grasp mechanics, every moment is filled with heart-pounding action. And now, dive into the solo or duo Quest mode for an electrifying single-player adventure like never before.
attr.inst:
GOG: Drop the .sh file inside the gamedata folder. 
Itch: Drop the .bin file inside the gamedata folder. 
For the DLC, put the repective file inside the gamedata folder as well.
Steam version does not work due to DRM!
